item.title: Starcom: Unknown Space
item.description:
Title: Starcom: Unknown Space
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , RPG
Developer: Wx3 Labs, LLC
Publisher: Wx3 Labs, LLC
Franchise: Starcom
Release Date: Sep 2, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Dec 14, 2022




About This Game

Starcom: Unknown Space is an action adventure RPG of space exploration, ship building and fast-paced tactical combat. Enter a vast open-world universe filled with alien factions vying for power, strange worlds to explore, mysteries to investigate, and a sinister enemy that threatens the galaxy with an ancient power.

Explore


Explore a fully-open world universe with over a hundred star systems filled with undiscovered planets, mysterious artifacts, lost derelicts, and strange phenomena. Over 230 anomalies to investigate, each uniquely illustrated and with their own story.


Build Your Starship


Transform your small scout ship into a powerful starship of your own design with an innovative shipbuilding system. Make a deep space explorer, a fast strike craft, or an armor-leaden battlecruiser. Experiment with different designs and share your blueprints with others.

Discover & Research


Every new scientific discovery grants Research Points allowing you to unlock new modules and enhancements with a deep technology research tree. Choose techs that favor your preferred gameplay style: Upgrade your plasma cannons or unlock long range missiles? Better armor or shields? Unlock crew specializations first or a larger hull?

Make Allies & Enemies


The galaxy is full of unique alien factions each with their own motives. Decide who you will trust, trade with, hire, or vaporize.

More Features:


  • 60+ main story and side-quest missions to discover
  • Train your command crew to improve their skills and ship management bonuses
  • Smart autopilot to known locations, discover fast-travel gateways to distant systems, or venture into the unknown void
  • Alien factions will change their disposition and behavior depending on your actions
  • Collect, analyze, and trade over 100 different artifacts
  • Detailed, searchable ship log of every encounter and interaction
  • Save anywhere outside combat

Fans of Starcom: Nexus should know that the overall game mechanics have remained similar (with a lot of improvements), this is not a direct sequel-- it is a brand new story. New players will not need to be familiar with the plot of Starcom: Nexus to jump right in.



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 8/10/11
    • Processor: Core i5 2.3 GHz+
    • Memory: 6 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 2 GB Direct3D 11 Capable video card or better (see additional notes)
    • DirectX: Version 10
    • Storage: 3 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Some users have reported issues with older, integrated Intel laptop GPUs. Dedicated GPU recommended. Installing to SSD recommended.
    Recommended:
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or better
    • DirectX: Version 11

item.title: Sumerian Six
item.description:
Title: Sumerian Six
Genre: Action , Strategy
Developer: Artificer
Publisher: Devolver Digital
Franchise: Devolver Digital
Release Date: Sep 2, 2024




About This Game



Sumerian Six follows the Enigma Squad, a team of commandos composed of the world’s greatest scientists who combine their skills to conduct secret missions in their fight against the Third Reich. Together, you seek to thwart ex-member Hans Kammler's nefarious plans involving a powerful, mystical substance named Geiststoff.

Embark on a thrilling journey across multiple continents alongside allies such as the exiled chemist Rosa Reznick, Wojtek the Werebear, and the esoteric psychoanalyst Siegfried von Adelsberg. Dispose of your enemies by using each team member’s unique set of abilities inspired by their fields of expertise, and learn to master the art of chaining them together for devastating effects if you hope to be successful.

As you delve deeper into the Nazi plot, you’ll encounter occult-scientific weapons and ancient Sumerian artifacts linked to Kammler's machinations. A grim future awaits you should the Nazis be victorious, so do your best to prevent that dark timeline from coming true in this real-time tactical stealth adventure.

Demon Nazis

Led by Hans Kammler, a former member of your Squad, the Nazis tap into the occult to create the ultimate Wunderwaffe. Face off against heavily armed, mutated, and supernaturally charged forces, and put your strategic abilities and dexterity to the ultimate test.

Playful Violence Meets Super Science

Sneak your way around Nazi strongholds and dispatch the ever-present watchmen in a variety of ways before taking on the more serious threats before you. Combine your team's dynamic powers in creative displays of tactical might.

Travel the World

Inspired by real places and events, Sumerian Six takes you on a journey through an alternate history where folk stories and conspiracy theories are as real as the Nazi threat.

AI Generated Content Disclosure

The developers describe how their game uses AI Generated Content like this:

AI tools were used to pre-generate a marching song heard during one of the sequences in late game.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 x64 Bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-8350
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 780 / Radeon RX 560X
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 20 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Low Quality setting, in 720p, producing 30 FPS
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 11 x64 Bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-6950X / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 / Radeon RX 5700 XT
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 20 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: High Quality setting, in 1080p, producing 40 FPS

item.title: Dale & Dawson Stationery Supplies
item.description:
Title: Dale & Dawson Stationery Supplies
Genre: Casual , RPG , Strategy
Developer: Striped Panda Studios
Publisher: Striped Panda Studios
Release Date: Aug 30, 2024




About This Game

The Manager

The Manager is the office's ultimate authority figure, tasked with ensuring productivity and firing the Slackers hiding among the Specialists.

Slackers

The Slacker's goal is to goof off without getting caught. Whether it’s playing Minesweeper, or taking a dump, Slackers must blend in to avoid the Manager’s wrath.

Specialists

Specialists are the backbone of the company, assigned various tasks that keep the office running smoothly. But even the hardest workers know that productivity sometimes requires a coffee break.

Gameplay Mechanics

  • Objective-Based Gameplay: Specialists are tasked with completing objectives to contribute to the company's success, whereas Slackers engage in activities to appear busy while avoiding actual work.
  • Social Deduction and Strategy: Players utilize proximity voice chat for real-time discussions, alliances, and accusations, making social interactions crucial to gameplay.
  • Managerial Oversight: The Manager must observe, deduce, and decide who to fire, with each choice potentially altering the game's balance.
    Experience the Office Like Never Before:
Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel i5-6400
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 960
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 11
    • Processor: Intel i7-7700k
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1080Ti
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 2 GB available space

item.title: Megaloot
item.description:
Title: Megaloot
Genre: Casual , Indie , RPG , Strategy
Developer: axilirate
Publisher: Ravenage Games , INSTINCT3
Franchise: Ravenage
Release Date: Aug 30, 2024




About This Game



There is a mysterious tower in this world that replicates all sorts of objects from other realities, creating an indefinite space full to the brim with monsters, strange creatures, people, and loot. You have found yourself in this reality, and now it’s your path.



Entering the tower, you find yourself in fierce battles that require valuable loot items - armor, magic rings, weapons, and much more. These are essential tools for developing your unique builds while clearing the tower's floors.

Defeat enemies and earn gold, which can be spent on new loot items. Continuously manage your loot to become stronger right in the battle by absorbing the mythical power of the items you discard - even if for a mere moment, but with dedication it’s enough to ascend to near godhood and kill whatever twisted creature stands in your way.

Loot in Megaloot serves dual purposes: it can be equipped to enhance the player’s character or consumed during battle for immediate stat boosts. After clearing each floor, you have the option to dismantle loot for permanent stat gains, adding layers of strategic depth to the gameplay.



Combine loot strategically to craft dominating builds and become the ultimate power hunter. Balance between strengths and weaknesses to maximize your power to the fullest extent.



Key features:

  • 150+ unique loot items with many variations of characteristics that have a synergistic effect to create unique builds
  • 27+ stats like Toxicity, Strength, Wisdom, Faith, Recovery, and more, which can be combined with loot and keystones for a unique strategy and tactics
  • 10 characters with their abilities
  • Simple, addictive, and challenging gameplay
  • High replayability at any time




Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10/11
    • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3
    • Storage: 500 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10/11
    • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • Graphics: Support for Vulkan
    • Storage: 500 MB available space

item.title: Yarimono
item.description:
Title: Yarimono
Genre: Adventure , Indie , RPG
Developer: にゅう工房
Publisher: 072 Project
Franchise: 072 Project
Release Date: Aug 30, 2024




About This Game




Over 150 unique monsters! A massive RPG with an abundance of rich content.
Train your monster with the goal of becoming the champion!

Only the main character's partner possesses the cheat move called "Cheat Tackle".
It ensures a guaranteed first strike and a one-hit kill.
In the easy mode, you can even use it endlessly!





In this world, there exists mystical creatures known as "Yarimon".
Known as the loner protagonist with the weakest Yarimon... until now, that is.

In a surprising turn of events, the protagonist's Yarimon partner learned a godly-powerful move with a power level of 800,000 called the "Cheat Tackle".
With this, the protagonist's world completely changed, as this move will one-shot any opponent in battle (though it is only usable once per battle).

Of course, it would be foolish to believe that one can become the champion with just a single move. Therefore, a trainer must continue to hone their skills and diversify their strategies.
With that said, defeating my childhood friend for the first time is already a crazy accomplishment.
I can finally get back some of the money I lost to her...

Afterwards, I set out on an adventure after my childhood friend told me she was going on a journey and pressured me to do the same.



As I am adventuring, I slowly unravel the secret of this world.
This is when I felt like my journey had really begun.

Aim to complete the Yarimon Encyclopedia (Yaridex)!!





Monster-taming RPG
Collect a variety of Yarimon and strive relentlessly towards the championship!

Gain EXP by battling either wild Yarimon or trainers.
With the advent of EXP shards, you will also be able to freely allocate EXP to your favorite Yarimon!

Uncover the truth and secrets that are hidden within this world!

Explore the secrets hidden in this world, gradually unveiling it's truth!

  • Over 150 monsters
  • Pixel art for each character
  • Illustrations for each character along with various facial expressions
  • Having a monster index





Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

The game contains virtual and unrealistic combat violence and slightly revealing clothing.



System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
    • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
    • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Storage: 4 GB available space
